donations.title: Support Education
donations.description: Your contribution will empower children with knowledge and skills for a brighter future.

donations.title: Provide Nutritious Food
donations.description: Help ensure that no child goes to bed hungry. Your donation supports food programs.

donations.title: Clothing Assistance
donations.description: Provide warm clothing to protect children from the cold and promote their well-being.

donations.title: Healthcare Support
donations.description: Your donation contributes to medical care, vaccinations, and health awareness programs.
